info.title: Sunwave API
info.description:
This is the API documentation used for the integration of phone systems with the Sunwave Platform. You can find out more about Sunwave at [http://www.sunwavehealth.com](http://www.sunwavehealth.com). For this API, you must use use the api keys provided by Sunwave for authorization.

Base URLs:
- [https://emr.sunwavehealth.com/SunwaveEMR](https://emr.sunwavehealth.com/SunwaveEMR)
- [Terms of service](https://www.sunwavehealth.com/terms-and-conditions/) Email: [Support](mailto:info@sunwavehealth.com)

# Digest Authentication:
- **Authorization Header** 
  - Authorization: Digest $token
  
  GET requests: 
  **seed** = user_id:client_id:dateTimeBase64:clinic_id:unique_transaction_id
  
  POST requests: 
  **seed** = user_id:client_id:dateTimeBase64:clinic_id:unique_transaction_id:Base64Encode(md5Hex(payload))
  
  **token** = **seed**:JWT.hmac(**seed**, **client_secret**)
  
- **Parameters**
  - **user_id**: The use's account for Sunwave Health. It must have an email to be used for this validation.
  - **client_id**: The unique identifier we assign to user of external API call. Random 32 character string             generated using custom Sunwave Health algorithm.
  - **client_secret**: Secret we assign to the user of the Rest API. It is 256 characters randomly generated by custom algorithm.
  - **dateTimeBase64**: Base64 encoded of the GMT DateTime string formatted as "EEE, d MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss Z"
    Example: Thu, 8 Sep 2022 19:34:06 +0000
  - **clinic_id**: Realm to the user id is to be validated against.
  - **unique_transaction_id**: A unique id the customer generates for each transaction.Can not be reused.

get.summary: Notify users of incoming phone calls

parameters.name: ANI
parameters.description: Caller ID. This is the phone number of the client that is dialing the treatment center

parameters.name: campaign_id
parameters.description: Sunwave identifier of the campaign corresponding to the incoming phone call

parameters.name: campaign_name
parameters.description: Name descriptive of the campaign corresponding to the incoming phone call

parameters.name: station_id
parameters.description: Identifier of the user's station to which the phone call is being routed to. If the call is to be broadcasted to all the stations, this parameter should have the value BROADCAST

text.description: Comment, description, or content corresponding to the type of activity (Email, Call, Sms, Task, Workflow, Note, Meeting, Wave).

type.description: Activity Type (Email, Call, Sms, Meeting, Task, Workflow, Note, Wave)

workflow_status.description: Workflow Status apply only when the Activity Type is Workflow

assigned_to.description: User Id to whom the task was assigned

assigned_to_name.description: User Name to whom the task was assigned

task_type.description: Task type (Call, Email, Chat, Crete a Text message, To-do)

call_outcome.description: Call Outcome (No answer, Busy, Wrong number, Left a voicemail, Connected)

created_by.description: The Id of the user who registered the activity or 'system' if the activity was registered automatically.

assessment_uuid.description: Unique Id of the assessment component

payment_plan_patient_date_of_birth.description: Payment Plan Patient Date Of Birth

Levels Of Care List.description: List of Levels of Care entities

Previous Admission Id.description: ID of the patient's previous admission

LevelOfCare.description: Object for level of care specifics

FormSectionEntity.description: Response entity for a section of forms

FormInstance.description: Response object for an individual instance

FormStandardResponse.description: Response object when requesting general list of forms

Transfer From.description: Name of the realm the patient is transferring from.

account_id.description: Account Id is the id of the account in the system posting the data. Used to tie together Sunwave's account id with the sending system's account id. Must be unique.

opportunity_id.description: Opportunity Id is the id of the opportunity in the system posting the data. Used to tie together Sunwave's opportunity id with the sending system's opportunity id. Must be unique.

OpportunityBase.description: Opportunity template entity with fields relating for admitted and non-admitted entities

description.example: Absence epileptic syndrome, intractable, with status epilepticus

loc_day_or_night.description: Day or Night level of care

call_outcome.description: Call Outcome (No answer, Busy, Wrong number, Left a voicemail, Connected)

log_type.description: Activity Type (Email, Call, Sms, Meeting, Task, Workflow, Note, Wave)

task_assigned_to.description: The user assigned to the task

modified_on.description: Date and Time form is modified

form_created_on.description: Date and time from is created

last_login.description: Date user last logged into the system

app_id.description: API Digest key to authorize requests
app_id.name: Authorization
